sure_want_to_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete this account
your_watch_data_will_be_deleted: Your watch and movie data will be deleted.
you_dont_have_media_sources: O ko ni orisun media ti o muu ṣiṣẹ nitorina ko si media ti yoo wa fun wiwo
reload_to_apply_genre: Tun gbee si oju-iwe naa tabi tun bẹrẹ app lati lo awọn ayipada oriṣi
import_media_source: Orisun Media gbe wọle (Fi sori ẹrọ/Aifi si po)
network_proxy_client_addresses_desc1: Fun ẹrọ ti ko le ṣe igbasilẹ ohun elo naa, ṣabẹwo eyikeyi ninu adirẹsi alabara aṣoju wọnyi
network_proxy_client_addresses_desc2: ninu ẹrọ aṣawakiri rẹ lati wọle si ohun elo naa. Ṣe akiyesi pe o gbọdọ sopọ si nẹtiwọọki kanna (Wifi, Ethernet ati bẹbẹ lọ) bi apẹẹrẹ yii.
custom_middleware_address_with_port_desc: Yiyipada adirẹsi agbedemeji rẹ tumọ si pe iwọ yoo gba media nipasẹ adirẹsi ti a ti sọ pato (nigbagbogbo wiwo olumulo miiran diẹ sii middleware). Adirẹsi middlware rẹ ṣiṣẹ ti o ba wa lori nẹtiwọki kanna nigbagbogbo Wifi, Ethernet tabi WAN. Ti o ko ba gba eyikeyi media lati adiresi middleware ti a ṣeto pato ninu apoti ọrọ yi iye pada si adiresi agbedemeji ti ara ẹni
paste_media_source_json: Paste the media source json object
new_version_desc2: Continue to download view me version
